verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Waters of your holy spirit
running deep with my soul
waters of your holy spirit make your life in me unfold
smoothing, soothing, the dark places within
washing, cleansing, refreshing everything that is longing
holy spirit run within me, cleanse me from all secret sin
flow through the depths within me, bring me unto him

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Waters of you holy spirit, running deep with my soul
waters of your holy spirit make your life in me unfold

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
disrupt, dislodge, discover all within that I may be found in the holy one
A river of gold flowing from the throne
come unto me and make me whole
